Multi-page website

This is an option for people who want and need as much as possible for their business. Real tigers

$3000

Why a multi-page website?

  • Multitasking

    A multi-page site can combine different goals and objectives, being at the same time an online store, business card, blog, forum and other formats

  • Wide audience

    Multi-page sites are visited by numerous target audience, which, probably, will want to purchase not one, but another product of the company

  • Filling content

    It is perfect for a variety of content: a large number of texts, images, cards of goods / services, videos, etc., which will always fill the site with useful and interesting information

  • SEO optimization

    Multi-page sites can be indexed by search engines, and bringing the site to the top of search engine results will provide additional traffic and conversion growth

Stages

  • Filling in the brief

    At this stage, we give you a Google document that describes your company and you fill it out

    Hours: 1-24

  • Wirefraymes

    Based on previously obtained data, the web designer creates a black and white layout structure of the future site (wireframe)

    Hours: 30-70

  • UI/UX Design

    After agreeing on the structure, fonts, ideas, the web designer fills the layout with "paints", selects the appropriate colors

    Hours: 60-400

  • Fron-end dev

    The front-end developer breathes life into the layout. It is his merit to place the site on the Internet, it is like a "body" of a car

    Hours: 100-600

  • Back-end dev

    Thanks to the backend, the site begins to play with new colors. it is responsible for communication, it is the "engine" of your site

    Hours: 100-600

  • QA Testing

    Tester tests the site from warframe, design, code, to a full test of ALL functionality and finding bugs so that users do not have to

    All the time of project development (300-1000+ h)
